options.content:
# Welcome to our ASSUME Simulation Comparison Demo

This is the Grafana Dashboard helps you to compare the results of two simulation. Please note, this dashboard is still under development. Here you can visualize the differences between two simulations. So if some/most of the plots are 0 it just means that the results of your simulation are the same. 

You are currently displaying the difference between:
##### ${simulation_comp}  -  ${simulation}

# Market-specific Data

Data specific for the market depending on the choice made at te top of the panel

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim1."Price" as "Price $simulation", sim2."Price" as "Price $simulation_comp" , sim2."Price" - sim1."Price" as "Price Difference" from (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation') AND ("market_id" LIKE '$market') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1) sim1
join (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_comp') AND ("market_id" LIKE '$market') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1) sim2 on sim1.time = sim2.time

panels.description: Overview of market results for the chossen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2."Demand Volume" - sim1."Demand Volume" as "Demand Volume Difference", sim2."Supply Volume" - sim1."Supply Volume" as "Supply Volume Difference" from (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  demand_volume AS "Demand Volume",
  supply_volume AS "Supply Volume"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation') AND ("market_id" LIKE '$market') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start, demand_volume, supply_volume
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
join (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  demand_volume AS "Demand Volume",
  supply_volume AS "Supply Volume"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_comp') AND ("market_id" LIKE '$market') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start, demand_volume, supply_volume
ORDER BY 1
) sim2 on sim1."Demand Volume" = sim2."Demand Volume"

select sim1."time", sim2."Price" - sim1."Price" as "Price Difference" from (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation') AND ("market_id" LIKE '$market') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1) sim1
join (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_comp') AND ("market_id" LIKE '$market') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1) sim2 on sim1.time = sim2.time

panels.title: Market Summary $market Differences

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2." " - sim1." " as "Price", sim1.bid_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_price) AS " ",
  case
    when bid_type isnull then concat(unit_id, '_SB')
    when bid_type != '' then concat(unit_id, '_', bid_type)
  end AS "bid_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_type
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_price) AS " ",
  case
    when bid_type isnull then concat(unit_id, '_SB')
    when bid_type != '' then concat(unit_id, '_', bid_type)
  end AS "bid_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_type
ORDER BY 1) sim2
on sim1.time = sim2.time and sim1.bid_id = sim2.bid_id

panels.title: Accepted Bid Prices Difference

panels.description: Accepted Volume  per unit in chosen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2." " - sim1." " as "Volume", sim1.bid_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(volume) AS " ",
  case
    when bid_type isnull then concat(unit_id, '_SB')
    when bid_type != '' then concat(unit_id, '_', bid_type)
  end AS "bid_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_type
ORDER BY 1
) sim1 
join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(volume) AS " ",
  case
    when bid_type isnull then concat(unit_id, '_SB')
    when bid_type != '' then concat(unit_id, '_', bid_type)
  end AS "bid_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_type
ORDER BY 1
) sim2 on sim1.time = sim2.time and sim1.bid_id = sim2.bid_id

panels.title: Accepted Bid Volume Difference

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  simulation,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as "Total cost",
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as "Total volume"
FROM kpis
group by simulation
ORDER BY simulation

SELECT
  simulation,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'avg_price') as avg_price,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as total_cost,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2)*1000)  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as total_volume
  
FROM kpis
where variable in ('total_cost', 'total_volume', 'avg_price')
group by simulation
ORDER BY simulation

panels.description: Shows installed capacities in the simulation based on the fuel type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  NOW() as time_sec,
  SUM(max_power),
  technology
FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE "simulation" LIKE '$simulation'
GROUP BY technology, simulation;

panels.title: Installed Generation Capacities

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2."market_dispatch" - sim1."market_dispatch" as "market_dispatch", sim1.unit_id, sim1.market_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "market_dispatch",
  unit_id,
  market_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
left join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "market_dispatch",
  unit_id,
  market_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id and sim1.market_id = sim2.market_id and sim1.time=sim2.time

select sim1."time", sim2."dispatch" - sim1."dispatch" as "dispatch", sim1.unit from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
left join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.unit = sim2.unit and sim1.time=sim2.time

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE index in ($Gen_Units) and simulation = '$simulation'

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2."price" - sim1."price" as "price", sim2."volume" - sim1."volume" as "volume", sim1.unit_id from (
select
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_price) AS "price",
  avg(volume) AS "volume",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
left join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_price) AS "price",
  avg(volume) AS "volume",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.time = sim2.time and sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id

panels.title: Accepted Bid Prices

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2."power" - sim1."power" as "power", sim1.unit_id, sim1.market_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id,
  market_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim1 left join
(SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id,
  market_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1) sim2
on sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id and sim1.market_id = sim2.market_id and sim1.time=sim2.time

select sim1."time", sim2."dispatch" - sim1."dispatch" as "dispatch", sim1.unit from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
left join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.unit = sim2.unit and sim1.time=sim2.time

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen storage unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2."power" - sim1."power" as "power", sim1.unit_id, sim1.market_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id,
  market_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim1 join
(SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id,
  market_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1) sim2
on sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id and sim1.market_id = sim2.market_id and sim1.time=sim2.time

select sim1."time", sim2."dispatch" - sim1."dispatch" as "dispatch", sim1.unit from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.unit = sim2.unit and sim1.time=sim2.time
